game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is plagued by a terrible curse that causes all living things to slowly turn to stone.
game.ending: With the help of his new allies, the protagonist must journey to the ancient ruins of Eldrador and defeat the dark sorceress Azura, who seeks to exploit the curse for her own gain.
game.synopsis: In a desperate bid to restore magic to the world, the protagonist sets out on a perilous quest to unite the warring kingdoms of Eridoria against a common enemy. Along the way, he discovers that the true source of the curse is not what it seems, and that an ancient evil threatens to destroy everything.
game.title: Shattered Realms
